Business_Definition: Total passenger and ancillary revenue generated
Total operational cost including fuel, staff and airport fees
Revenue minus total operating cost
Route profit divided by total revenue
Total tickets sold across routes
Revenue per ticket sold
Revenue share from premium cabin classes
Average revenue generated per flight
Percentage of revenue from ancillary services
Seats sold divided by total seat capacity
Flights departing within 15 minutes of schedule

Fuel cost as percentage of total operating cost
Average monthly operating cost per route
Total number of KPIs marked as certified

Accuracy of revenue forecast relative to actuals
Calculation_Logic: 1 - ABS((Actual Revenue - Forecast Revenue) / Forecast Revenue)

Business_Definition: Accuracy of ticket forecast relative to actuals
Calculation_Logic: 1 - ABS((Actual Tickets - Forecast Tickets) / Forecast Tickets)

Business_Definition: Average number of days between booking and flight date
3-month rolling growth rate in tickets sold
Composite score combining load volatility, margin volatility and cancellation rate
